full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Request for Proposal (RFP) - Gas Chromatograph Acquisition

**Project Information**

* **Project Title:** Acquisition of a Gas Chromatograph
* **Reference Number:** CB-531-73067632
* **Amendment Number:** 3
* **Solicitation Number:** 01R11-24-C053
* **Publication Date:** October 30, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** November 14, 2023, at 12:00 PM
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** Not specified
* **Expected Contract End Date:** Not specified
* **Tender Status:** Expired

#### Project Description

The Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) is seeking a supplier to provide a Gas Chromatograph to the AAFC's Swift Current Research and Development Center. The successful bidder will be responsible for the supply and delivery of the equipment.

#### Notice Type

This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement, and only suppliers currently pre-qualified on Supply Arrangement #E60PV-19EQUI have been invited to participate.

#### Requirements

* Suppliers must hold a Supply Arrangement for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies from Public Works and Government Services Canada.
* Suppliers must meet the mandatory technical criteria.
* The responsive bidder with the lowest aggregate price will be recommended for contract award.

#### Contact Information

For any inquiries or questions, please contact Zack Flamont at (639) 560-3462 or zack.flamont@agr.gc.ca.

#### Document

The complete tender package can be downloaded from the CanadaBuys portal at the following URL: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23469/rfp-01r11-24-c053_1.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23469/rfp-01r11-24-c053_1.pdf). 

Note: Only pre-qualified suppliers have been invited to bid, and any bids received from non-prequalified suppliers will not be evaluated. Suppliers may qualify for the supply arrangement at any time by downloading the solicitation document E60PV-19EQUI/D from CanadaBuys (SAP Ariba). 

**Important Dates**

* Publication Date: October 30, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: November 14, 2023
